# Sphinx 3DR Theme

## Requirements

- pip
- sphinx
- rubygems
- bundler
- node & npm
- bower
- grunt-cli

### Sphinx
```
pip install sphinx
```

### bundler
```
gem install bundler
```

### bower & grung-cli
```
npm install -g bower
npm install -g grunt-cli
```

## Development

### Install dependencies

```
npm install
bower install
```

### Run locally

```
grunt
```

### Build

```
grunt build
```
